title: Now that we know the Q double stacking w is a bug, these Vayne changes aren't that bad
body: Her Q bonus damage can't crit anymore so she can't ult, press Q, and then do 100% of a squishy's health with 1 auto and her W got buffed so she does more damage against tanks.  Being moved away from a squishy buster to a tank buster again.  Her ult changes might be broken idk, but the other changes aren't that bad.  Could be a lot worse.

replies.body: Yeah honestly it's only the ult changes that really bug me.

I'm not entirely sure it's healthy to begin with.  Vayne being almost dead, but then suddenly going back up to full health because she killed a tank doesn't seem balanced.  Considering she'll also have infinite heals and shields from her support and items to begin with, this just adds onto that.

Did the numbers. At uber late game the heal is going to be around 800ish more than likely. With Grievous wounds that drops to about 580 HP. Which is still a lot but not the full HP dream people are thinking. Probably going to see a nerf in the next couple of days too don't forget.

And you do realize that vayne needs to auto someone 3 times to proc it. Not to mention there is 4 other members than that cho'gath. The single proc will not be enough to shred through 10k HP. You would need to proc your **3 HIT PASSIVE** 6 times before you could fully kill him. That is 18 auto attacks on a target to just kill them in true damage. Now of course she has other factors like crit and bork to consider and if she has rage blade she will proc it faster. 

HOWEVER, that is in a straight 1v1 case where Vayne is only allowed to Auto a target. In a real teamfight it will be near impossible almost to truly proc that. Yes. people are blowing it way out of proportion. I like said when talking with you
>she could auto Q auto before. The minimum amount of damage she can deal went up by a WHOPPING 10 to 5 damage depending on skill level.

that's basically nothing early game. It's comparable to her -3 ad change in season 5, except a buff and not a nerf. It's a nerf late game too since she does less minimum damage at rank 5. 
>Late game 2% damage increase will be pretty meaningful but that's 12% to 14% isn't a huge change. If you have 3k health thats the difference of 60 damage. Nothing to completely scoff at but not gamebreaking.

2% isn't that bad when you do the math and look at it.

2% more of a chmapions max hp is enough for 6 procs to be worth 7 procs before the change.

It's a 16.6667% increase to damage, which is pretty fucking huge for a braindead, counterplay-less steroid with 100% up time that deals un-counterbuildable % max hp true damage from safety with literally no resource investment required at all on the Vayne's part. 

If I could delete one skill from any champion it would be either Xayah's ult (no ADC should ever have a fucking I-frame, let alone one they can heal/ghost/flash etc in, and move normally during, let alone have it also do AoE damage with the chance to then AoE or multitarget root afterwards) Or Vayne's Silver Bolts.  Neither skill should have ever been made, and neither of them should ever have buffs unless the skills very nature changes at the same time.
